question: Which of the following is a scheme launched by the government that aims to provide last mile connectivity and electricity connections to all households in rural and urban areas and aims to achieve universal household electrification in the country?
explanation: Pradhan Mantri Sahaj Bijli Har Ghar Yojana Saubhagya aims to achieve universal household electrification in the country. The objective of the scheme is to provide last mile connectivity and electricity connections to all households in rural and urban areas. Free of cost electricity connections to all remaining un-electrified households with at least one deprivation on the basis of SECC data in rural areas and economically poor households in urban areas would be given. Also, the households located in remote and inaccessible areas would be provided with Solar Photovoltaic (SPV) based standalone systems with LED lights, fan, power plug etc.
